pizzerias.name: Pizza Circus
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Especial (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, jamón dulce, piña, maíz)
pizzerias.description: Family-friendly pizzeria with circus-themed decor near Sagrada Familia. Their Hawaiian pizza includes sweet corn, a popular addition in Spanish variations of this international favorite.

pizzerias.name: La Bella Napoli
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicale (salsa de tomate, mozzarella fior di latte, jamón cocido, piña fresca)
pizzerias.description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria operating in Barcelona since 1979. Despite their traditional leanings, they offer a Hawaiian-style pizza using imported Italian ingredients and fresh pineapple.

pizzerias.name: Pizzería El Born
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiana Catalana (salsa de tomate, mozzarella, jamón serrano, piña caramelizada, rúcula)
pizzerias.description: Modern pizzeria in the trendy El Born district. Their Catalan twist on Hawaiian pizza substitutes standard ham with serrano ham and adds arugula, topped with caramelized pineapple.
